text: Raj Pathipati is an Indian film director and screenwriter who works in Kannada cinema.He is the director of Kaanadante Maayavadanu. ==Early life== Raj Pathipati was born in Chittoor district, Andhra Pradesh. He was brought up in Kadugudi, Bengaluru, Karnataka. ==Career== Raj Pathipati left diploma in engineer, to pursue a career in movies. He became an assistant to Pawan Kumar (director) for Lifeu Ishtene. He subsequently worked as an Associate Director to Yograj Bhat for the film Drama.https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/kannada/movies/news/Darshans- lookalike-nephew-Manoj-bags-Yogaraj-Bhat-film/articleshow/21823652.cms He was supposed to direct newcomer Manoj, related to Darshan http://www.newindianexpress.com/entertainment/kannada/2013/aug/28/Keeping-it- in-the-family-511224.html But, His first film failed to take off. He worked with Director Vikas for Jayammana Maga. His first movie as an independent director is Kaanadante Maayavadanu, produced by Back Benchers Motion Picture. ==Filmography== {|class="wikitable" !
